sentence: Hes been a Democrat for decades, but his hunger for power has obviously overtaken his hunger for reality, and with failed former President Donald Trumps blessing, he bolted from his gubernatorial race against Brian Kemp to try his hand at the 10th Congressional District race in Dekalba district he doesnt even live in.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: On Jan. 6 Vernon Jones switched parties. Trump's endorsing him for a Congressional seat in Georgia
